GSOL PA DANG, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS MOONGGAL GYI BU CHEN PO LA 'DI
SKAD CES BKA'


@482B STZAL TO, ,MOONGGAL GYI BU CHEN PO, DE DE BZHIN TE, DE NI,
KHYOD KYI SA YIN NO, ,MOONGGAL GYI BU, YONGS SU BRTAG PA NYE BAR
BZUNG STE PHYOGS BCU'I 'JIG RTEN NA SANGS RGYAS

KYI ZHING BRJOD DU MED PA RDUL PHRA MO'I RDUL SNYED KYI 'JIG RTEN
GYI KHAMS DAG NA SEMS CAN DAG SEMS CAN DU BSDU BAR BSDUS PA DE
DAG THAMS CAD SNGA PHYI MED PAR MI'I DNGOS

PO NYID THOB STE, BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG
CHUB MNGON PAR RDZOGS PAR SANGS RGYAS NAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA SO
SO'I DBU DE SNYED DU GYUR, SANGS RGYAS

BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE DAG RE RE'I DBU JI SNYED PA LA ZHAL DE SNYED DU
GYUR, DE DAG RE RE'I ZHAL JI SNYED PA LA LJAGS DE SNYED DU GYUR,
DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, MOONGGAL GYI BU, DE

BZHIN GSHEGS PA NI, YE SHES DPAG TU MED PA DANG LDAN, YE SHES
DPAG GIS MI LANG BA DANG LDAN, YE SHES GRANGS MED PA DANG LDAN,
YE SHES BSAM GYIS MI

KHYAB PA DANG LDAN, YE SHES GZHAL DU MED PA DANG LDAN, YE SHES
GZHAL GYIS MI LANG BA DANG LDAN, MOONGGAL GYI BU, DE BZHIN GSHEGS
PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG

DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS NI, YE SHES BRJOD DU MED PA DANG
LDAN PA YIN NO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL PA
DANG, TSE DANG LDAN PA MOONGGAL


@483A *, ,GYI BU CHEN PO BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA YI RANG
STE MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI YE SHES

RGYAS PA'I MDO SDE RIN PO CHE'I MTHAR PHYIN PA ZHES BYA BA THEG
PA CHEN PO'I MDO RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO PRA DZNY'A
WA RMA DANG, LO TZ'A BA

BANDHE YE SHES SNYING POS BSGYUR, RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO BI
SHUDDHA SIDHA DANG, SARBA DZNY'A DE BA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZ'A
BA BANDHE DPAL BRTZEGS KYIS ZHUS TE GTAN LA
